import React from 'react'; import PageHeader from '../../../components/PageHeader/PageHeader'; import ShoppingPic from '../../../images/login-temp.jpg'; import styles from './EditOffer.css'; import { FooterContainer } from '../../../containers/footer'; const EditOffer = () => { return (
); }; export default EditOffer;
